memberdef.name: FAISS_ASSERT
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (!(X)) { \ fprintf(stderr, \ "Faiss assertion '%s' failed in %s " \ "at %s:%d\n", \ #X, \ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__); \ abort(); \ } \ } while (false)

memberdef.name: FAISS_ASSERT_MSG
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (!(X)) { \ fprintf(stderr, \ "Faiss assertion '%s' failed in %s " \ "at %s:%d; details: " MSG "\n", \ #X, \ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__); \ abort(); \ } \ } while (false)

memberdef.name: FAISS_ASSERT_FMT
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (!(X)) { \ fprintf(stderr, \ "Faiss assertion '%s' failed in %s " \ "at %s:%d; details: " FMT "\n", \ #X, \ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__, \ __VA_ARGS__); \ abort(); \ } \ } while (false)

memberdef.name: FAISS_THROW_FMT
memberdef.initializer: do { \ std::string __s; \ int __size = snprintf(nullptr, 0, FMT, __VA_ARGS__); \ __s.resize(__size + 1); \ snprintf(&__s[0], __s.size(), FMT, __VA_ARGS__); \ throw faiss::FaissException( \ __s, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__); \ } while (false)

detaileddescription.para: Exceptions thrown upon a conditional failure

memberdef.name: FAISS_THROW_IF_MSG
FAISS_THROW_IF_NOT_FMT
